channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Hyundai just unveiled the Staria Camper Concept – and it looks like my ultimate off-grid EV
item.description: It's just a concept for now, but the Staria Camper has to be the most luxurious way to venture off the beaten path.

item.title: Some fantastic games are coming to Xbox Game Pass this month — here are the ones I'd recommend trying first
item.description: A leaker claims that the next Resident Evil remake will be a fresh version of an underrated spin-off.

item.title: 'You don’t have endless options': Amazon CEO Andy Jassy warns tariffs are already raising prices
item.description: Stockpiling bought consumers some time, but Trump's tariffs are pushing up prices across retail now.

item.title: Avengers: Doomsday's action will 'eclipse everything else Marvel has ever done', insider says — and details about its first scene seem to have leaked online
item.description: Fresh details about Avengers: Doomsday's reportedly action-heavy opening appear to have leaked online.

item.title: The Final Fantasy VII Remake Intergrade Switch 2 version is better than I expected — it isn’t flawless, but the game is still absolutely brilliant
item.description: Final Fantasy VII Remake Intergrade is incredible, and while the Nintendo Switch 2 version is a step down, I still love it.

item.title: Looking for a rice cooker? I test kitchen tech for a living, and these are my 3 recommendations for perfectly fluffy results
item.description: The best rice cookers give consistently great results with any grain – and a lot more besides.

item.title: Pendant que le prix des SSD ne cesse d’augmenter, cet HDD externe de 12 To perd 21 % de son prix chez Amazon
item.description: Avec ses 12 To de stockage et sa vitesse de transfert élevée, cet HDD de Western Digital se présente comme une excellente alternative à un SSD. Contrairement à ce dernier, il voit son prix baisser chez Amazon et, pendant les soldes d'hiver, il est vendu pour 248,64 euros.

item.title: Level Lock Pro Review (2026): Smart but Stylish
item.description: You’d never guess Level’s Lock Pro is smart by looking at it, and that’s my favorite part.

item.title: Modern head-fi specialist Meze Audio has a beautiful new pair of closed-back wired headphones that promise the detail and expansiveness of open backs — and it says they'll last for 'decades'
item.description: Meze's new dynamic headphones promise the best of both headphone worlds

item.title: ‘Maybe you’re developing a case of selective hearing’: Alexa+ gets sassy with user after they accuse it of making up false commands
item.description: Users are reporting that Alexa+ could be making up false requests, and it's giving them a sassy attitude in return.

item.title: Holy Crap, So Many People Watched ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ Last Year
item.description: A new report puts the animated sensation even above recent seasons of heavy-hitters 'Stranger Things' and 'Wednesday.'

item.title: Burritos from Heaven: Are drones the future of delivery?
item.description: On a blustery afternoon late last year, on the lawn just outside City Hall in Rowlett, Texas, a strange-looking craft cleared the trees just before me. It hovered overhead for a moment before lowering a second craft on a thin rope all the way to a parched patch of grass. The little, white thing deposited […]

item.title: What a Sony and TCL partnership means for the future of TVs
item.description: I'm not sure anyone saw this news coming, but the TV landscape as we know it could change considerably over the next year or two. Sony, the storied Japanese TV brand, has announced that it has signed a memorandum of understanding with its Chinese competitor TCL. This potential partnership - with TCL set to hold […]

item.title: Language learning marketplace Preply’s unicorn status embodies Ukrainian resilience
item.description: Language learning marketplace Preply is now valued at $1.2 billion after raising a $150 million that marks a new chapter for the 14-year-old company.

item.title: Netflix mobile app redesign will offer 'deeper integration' of vertical video
item.description: After testing the feature for the last six months or so, Netflix said it will bring vertical videos to its mobile app sometime later in 2026, TechCrunch reported. So far, the feature has been used to show clips promoting Netflix films and TV shows, letting you swipe to move to the next one à la TikTok or YouTube Shorts. Going forward, though, it could also serve as a promotion tool for new types of programs. “You can imagine us bringing more clips based on new content types, like video podcasts,” co-CEO Greg Peters said in an earnings call. That was another subject of discussion, as Netflix is...

item.title: We rate the GoPro Hero 13 Black as 'the best action camera for most people' — and right now it has a superb deal at Adorama
item.description: Adorama has the excellent GoPro Hero 13 Black at the same price we saw on Black Friday, but this deal is due to end in just a few days.

item.title: Windows 11 update is breaking sleep mode on some PCs — but there's one trick that might help
item.description: Microsoft might have fixed that bug with shutdowns, but its latest Windows 11 update means sleep mode now locks up some PCs.

item.title: Fini le goulot d’étranglement entre processeur et mémoire grâce à cette nouvelle puce intelligente
item.description: Des chercheurs de l'École polytechnique de Milan ont mis au point une nouvelle puce intelligente capable de réduire drastiquement la consommation d’énergie tout en accélérant le traitement des données massives. En délocalisant le calcul directement au sein de la mémoire, ce composant bouscule l'architecture traditionnelle des ordinateurs.

item.title: Cette alternative à Windows va devenir encore plus performante sur les SSD : voici comment
item.description: Grâce à Intel, Linux améliore significativement sa gestion du stockage NVMe sur les machines disposant de CPUs à grand nombre de cœurs. À la clé, 15 % de performances en plus pour certaines configurations... grâce à un simple patch.

item.title: How to watch the ICC T20 World Cup 2026 online for free
item.description: How to watch T20 World Cup for free. Live stream the 2026 T20 World Cup for free from anywhere in the world.

item.title: The EU wants to overhaul cybersecurity to shut out 'high-risk' foreign entities
item.description: European policymakers submit proposal to streamline the Cybersecurity Act in response to a rise in critical service attacks.

item.title: Soldes d’hiver : la 3e démarque démarre fort, voici les offres qui méritent votre argent
item.description: Cela fait déjà deux semaines que les soldes d'hiver ont commencé en France et que les e-commerçants tels qu'Amazon, Fnac, Darty, Boulanger ou encore Cdiscount partagent des offres. Aujourd'hui, c'est la 3e démarque et les promotions se multiplient.

item.title: This shapeshifting cleaner can transform into a robot vacuum, a stick vacuum or a mop — and I almost couldn't believe my eyes
item.description: The xLean TR1 can learn your own cleaning techniques, and mimic them in robot mode.

item.title: J’ai quitté Gmail, Google Photos, Windows, ChatGPT : voici pourquoi et comment faire cette démarche
item.description: Entre envie de soutenir l'économie européenne et crainte que les Américains puissent débrancher l'accès à leurs services : il peut être intéressant de chercher des alternatives aux produits de Google, Apple, Meta, Amazon et Microsoft. Voici comment j'ai débranché plusieurs services de ma vie personnelle.

item.title: Nikon Z5II Review: Fantastic Camera at a Budget Price
item.description: The second version of Nikon’s Z5 brings improved autofocus, faster burst rates, and impressive video specs, making it one of the best “entry-level” full-frame cameras on the market.

item.title: Pro-AI Super PACs Are Already All In on the Midterms
item.description: Silicon Valley’s battle against AI regulation is already shaping the next US election cycle.

item.title: India’s app downloads rebounded to 25.5 billion in 2025, fueled by AI assistants and microdrama boom
item.description: ChatGPT was the second most downloaded app in India for 2025 after Instagram.

item.title: Consumers spent more on mobile apps than games in 2025, driven by AI app adoption
item.description: Consumers spent more money in mobile apps than games in 2025, driven by AI app adoption.

item.title: Inside the ambitious plan to undo DOGE’s damage
item.description: A group of former government workers are developing a day-one plan for the next administration. A group of former government workers are developing a plan that a future administration can use to rebuild government services damaged by DOGE.

item.title: Boulanger frappe pour le lancement de la 3e démarque des soldes : les 18 deals à saisir
item.description: La 3ᵉ démarque vient tout juste de démarrer chez Boulanger, et les bonnes affaires continuent de s’enchaîner ! L’enseigne dévoile de nouvelles réductions encore plus alléchantes sur une large sélection de produits. C’est le moment parfait pour profiter de remises généreuses avant la fin des soldes.

item.title: Samsung profite des soldes pour casser le prix de son Galaxy Z Flip 7, le plus élégant des smartphones pliants
item.description: Le dernier smartphone à clapet de Samsung, le Galaxy Z Flip 7, se trouve déjà en forte promotion grâce aux soldes d'hiver : il tombe à 802 euros au lieu de 1 199 euros initialement.

item.title: Bring Heddonism to your home with Marshall's brand new Wi-Fi music hub — it turns Marshall's Bluetooth speakers into a multi-room system
item.description: Marshall's new Heddon media streaming hub streams from Wi-Fi to Auracast and works with the key music streamers.

item.title: Ninja's 'top-of-the-range' portable blender falls back to its Black Friday price on Amazon
item.description: The Ninja Blast Portable Blender is the best portable blender around for your daily smoothies. It's on sale now and I'm here to tell you why to buy it.

item.title: NYT Connections hints today: Clues, answers for January 21, 2026
item.description: Connections is a New York Times word game that's all about finding the "common threads between words." How to solve the puzzle.

item.title: NYT Strands hints, answers for January 21, 2026
item.description: The NYT Strands hints and answers you need to make the most of your puzzling experience.

item.title: Research firm warns gamers to expect a 'global' Nintendo Switch 2 price hike
item.description: A prominent gaming market research firm predicts that a Nintendo Switch 2 price hike is on the way.

item.title: Wordle today: Answer, hints for January 21, 2026
item.description: Here's the answer for "Wordle" #1676 on January 21 as well as a few hints, tips, and clues to help you solve it yourself.

item.title: NYT Mini crossword answers, hints for January 21, 2026
item.description: Answers to each clue for the January 21, 2026 edition of NYT's The Mini crossword puzzle.

item.title: La fronde contre l’algorithme de la CAF, accusé de sur-contrôler les plus précaires, s’élargit, avec un nouvel allié de taille
item.description: L'algorithme de notation utilisé par la CAF est-il discriminatoire ? Alors que le recours devant le Conseil d'Etat formé par 15 organisations a été rejoint par 10 autres associations ou syndicats, la fronde peut désormais s'appuyer sur un avis du Défenseur des droits. L'autorité indépendante estime que l'outil utilisé par la CAF « paraît produire un surcontrôle des populations les plus précaires »....

item.title: The Pokémon TCG Mega Charizard X ex Ultra-Premium Collection has hit a record-low price at Amazon
item.description: Amazon has dropped the Mega Charizard X ex Ultra-Premium Collection to $149.99, its lowest price ever seen.

item.title: Sony n’en veut pas mais ces développeurs l’ont fait : Bloodborne existe en 4K et 60 FPS sur PC
item.description: Sans portage PC ni version PS5 en vue, Bloodborne frustre de nombreux joueurs avec sa version PS4 datée. La communauté de l'émulation fait cependant des miracles depuis plusieurs années avec un travail digne d'un véritable remaster.

item.title: The TCL 75-Inch Class S5 TV is under $500 right now at Amazon
item.description: As of Jan. 21, the TCL 75-Inch Class S5 UHD 4K LED Smart TV is on sale for $479.99 at Amazon. This saves you 26% off its list price of $649.99.

item.title: PowerToys : Microsoft déploie un torrent nouveautés pour son meilleur outil
item.description: Microsoft vient de mettre à jour ses PowerToys pour y intégrer un nouvel utilitaire pour la souris et un énorme coup de fouet pour sa Palette de commandes, son lanceur rapide pour Windows.

item.title: Stephen Colbert offers a bleak recap of Trumps first year back in office
item.description: Stephen Colbert has recapped the first year of Trump's second term in office in a "Late Show" monologue.

item.title: ‘I’m Witnessing a Lot of Emptiness’: How ICE Uprooted Normal Life in Minneapolis
item.description: WIRED talks to a postal worker, a teacher, two US citizens detained by federal agents, and six more Minnesota residents about life in an occupied American city.

item.title: How to Fix Your Wi-Fi Problems (2026)
item.description: Is your magic internet box giving you problems? Get back online and stay there with our expert Wi-Fi fixes and tips.

item.title: Ozempic just released its own version of the iconic Mac vs. PC ad
item.description: Novo Nordisk’s ‘There’s Only One Ozempic’ campaign is about reasserting the drugmaker’s brand name in an increasingly competitive landscape. Ozempic-maker Novo Nordisk turned to the actors from Apple’s 2000s “Get a Mac” ads to differentiate its GLP-1 medication amid a rising sea of competitors.

item.title: Home price forecast for 2026 across 380 housing markets: Zillow versus Moody’s forecast model
item.description: The worst of the pain in the housing market might be now and in the next 6 to 9 months. After that, things will begin to feel a little better—but not good. Want more housing market stories from Lance Lambert’s ResiClub in your inbox? Subscribe to the ResiClub newsletter.

item.title: Vie numérique | L’IA générative plus créative que nous, sauf que…
item.description: L’IA générative est-elle plus créative que les humains ? « Noui », répondent dans une importante étude publiée ce mercredi des universitaires montréalais, dont le chercheur Yoshua Bengio. Car si certaines IA sont plus créatives que la moyenne de la population, elles le sont moins que les plus créatifs d’entre nous.
